quote_last: every morning, my wife and I would take a cooler down to the beach. We’d lather up with sunblock, then sprawl out on mats on the sand. I’d never read it, so I had no idea what she meant.
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman

quote_last: one Sunday morning. Two Sundays—ten days—ago.” At ten I turned off the TV, went back to my room, and went to sleep.
